item.title: Reparations
item.author: mark@thefullertonian.com (Mark Stouffer)
item.description: The season opens with establishment of several character’s drive, or long-term intent, but it also explores the two main character’s motivation. WENDY: Is this what we wanted? Another man is dead. MARTY: People make choices, Wendy, and choices have consequences. WENDY: Still, you could admit that it was good for us. It’s dificult to tell from this exchange, which was featured in the Season 2 Trailer, if Wendy is saying that the fact that it was good for them poses a problem, which must be “admitted”.

item.title: The Big Sleep
item.author: mark@thefullertonian.com (Mark Stouffer)
item.description: MARTY I always thought we were different than them, those people they work for.
